column1: '''''galad''''' is a [[Sindarin]] word for "radiance", "glittering", or "reflection", usually connected to water, gems, or a smooth surface.<ref name=PM>{{PM
column2: XI}}, "The names of Finwë's descendants" (section 5), p. 347</ref>

column1: Tolkien experimented with several possible etymologies of ''galad'':
#''galad'' deriving from [[Common Eldarin]] ''ñalatā'' ("radiance, glittering reflection"), from [[Sundocarme
